name: Covert Exposure Tactics
description: Safely revealing the presence of PSNs without direct confrontation or retaliation.

cards.title: Strategic Whistleblowing Without Retaliation
cards.description: Exposing PSNs while minimizing personal risk and ensuring maximum impact.
bulletpoints: Use encrypted communication channels and anonymous platforms to release intel.
Leverage collective testimonies to prevent retaliatory targeting of a single individual.
Distribute information strategically to maximize pressure from multiple angles.

cards.title: Controlled Information Leaks to Destabilize PSNs
cards.description: Releasing damaging information in a way that maximizes internal fractures.
bulletpoints: Leak small, verifiable pieces of truth to encourage others to investigate further.
Expose conflicting narratives within PSN ranks to create internal mistrust.
Encourage whistleblowing within PSN structures by sowing doubts about loyalty.

cards.title: Using Psychological Disarmament to Weaken PSN Defenses
cards.description: Undermining PSN influence by neutralizing their psychological weapons.
bulletpoints: Turn their own psychological tactics against them by mirroring and exaggerating their manipulations.
Expose inconsistencies in their messaging to create public doubt.
Leverage humor and satire to disempower their authority without direct confrontation.
